entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who is facing a dementor.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: A dark creature that feeds on human happiness and is feared by wizards.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends and a fellow student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends and a fellow student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: Patronus
entities.description: A magical creature that is summoned to protect wizards from dementors.

entities.name: boggart
entities.description: A shape-shifter that can take on many forms, but is vulnerable to the spell Riddikulus.

relationships.description: Harry is facing a dementor, which is trying to suck the happiness out of him.
Harry summons a Patronus to protect himself from the dementor.
Harry uses the spell Riddikulus to defeat the boggart.
